Title: Sapta Sagaradaache Ello – Side A
Overview: In the heart of 'Sapta Sagaradaache Ello’ (Somewhere Beyond the Seven Seas), resides an ardent love story between Manu and Priya. Set in 2010, the couple hails from a middle-class background. Circumstances land Manu in jail, putting his relationship with Priya in jeopardy.

When Demonetization (currency ban) is announced in India, 3 unlikely characters come face to face for a bag of cash. After that a car journey begins and some more characters come into picture. This results in a cat and mouse game with a very unexpected outcome.

Title: Yadha Yadha Hi
Overview: Three exceptionally intelligent and shrewd individuals, creating an edge-of-the-seat experience.

Title: Hondisi Bareyiri
Overview: A story of a bunch of college friends who reunite after many years. It focuses on their college life, leading to the responsibilities of adulthood and their struggle to find solace amidst their complex relationships.
